description:
This course is all about creating a website from scratch and make it profitable to generate at least $1000/month within the shortest time possible. I have seen people struggling to make a living. Lot of people know that others are making good money with their website. But they don't know how to do the same.I have created many websites and made them profitable. It is easy as well as fun. But I can create profitable website so easily because I am doing this for 6 years now and making $5000 per month. For a newbie, creating profitable website is not as easy as for me.

There are lot of stuff needed like choosing the best domain according to your niche, selecting keywords for your post and then optimization.

Today you can start your own journey to make a website from scratch which can generate at least $1000/month.

$1000/month is very doable and can be achieved by working 2 hours a day for 2 months. And this is not the limit. More content you will write more website traffic you will get and hence more profit.

About this course:

  • No YouTube, No marketing or anything else is required.
  • Full free Lifetime access
  • Extra lectures and upgrades are always included for free.
  • Udemy 30 day money back guarantee.
  • Requires only 1 hour of your time to learn as lectures are straight forward.

Today you can create your website in just 2 hours and start adding content. Your initial goal is to make $1000/month at the end of 2 months of work.

Just need to write 2 articles everyday to make 120 articles at the of 2 months. Which will keep driving traffic for years to drive revenue. If you can't write yourself then you can outsource.

You will know

1. The best niche having huge potential.

2. How to choose domain to get better ranking in Google.

3. Where to get the best and reliable hosting.

4. How to Install WordPress within minutes.

5. What are the plugins every blogger Must install.

6. Choosing the topic or ideas about content.

7. Becoming Affiliate of high paying website according to niche.

8. Simple easy way to learn how affiliate marketing works.

9. Taking action to achieve $1000/month goal in just 2 months.

And Much More

If you want to make a long time business then creating your own niche website is the best thing. In this course you will learn everything you need to create a niche website.

So Enroll Now
title: Website Development: Create & Monetize a Site from Scratch
